src:
Foto Bisnis
Mal Disulap Jadi Apartemen Mewah, Begini Jadinya
03 Nov 2019, 08:23 by Istimewa
 Ceko - Bekas pusat perbelanjaan yang berdiri tahun 1980-an di Ceko disulap menjadi apartemen mewah. Bagaimana jadinya?



Perusahaan arsitektur Ceko, ov-a adalah pihak dibalik permak pusat perbelanjaan jadi apartemen. BoysPlayNice/Inhabitat. 



Para arsitek menciptakan Apart-hotel Svaty Vavrinec itu dengan bahan-bahan alami. BoysPlayNice/Inhabitat. 



Ada 90 kamar apartemen di lokasi yang berdekatan dengan pegunungan Alpen itu. BoysPlayNice/Inhabitat. 



Terdiri dari empat menara apartemen berbalut kayu. BoysPlayNice/Inhabitat. 



Ada ruang terbuka, ruang barbeque dengan tempat duduk, taman bermain anak-anak, dan teras pribadi untuk suite individu. BoysPlayNice/Inhabitat. 



Tersedia juga supermarket, apotek, toko alat olahraga, dan toko layanan ski dan sepeda. BoysPlayNice/Inhabitat.
text:
Business Photos
Malls Turned into Luxury Apartments, Here's the Way
03 Nov 2019, 08:23 by Special
Czech - The former shopping center that was founded in the 1980s in the Czech Republic was transformed into a luxury apartment. How come?



Czech architectural firm, ov-a is the party behind the change of shopping centers to apartments. BoysPlayNice / Inhabitat.



The architects created the Svaty Vavrinec Apart-hotel with natural materials. BoysPlayNice / Inhabitat.



There are 90 apartment rooms in a location adjacent to the Alps. BoysPlayNice / Inhabitat.



Consists of four apartment towers clad in wood. BoysPlayNice / Inhabitat.



There is an open space, barbecue room with seating, children's playground, and private terrace for individual suites. BoysPlayNice / Inhabitat.



There are also supermarkets, pharmacies, sporting goods stores, and ski and bicycle service shops. BoysPlayNice / Inhabitat.
